ad1.title: In a Crowded World Be the One That Stands Out

config: Right now, people are looking for a lawyer like you. With Justia Premium Placements, you will stand out.

• Get Up to 280x More Profile Views
  • Remove Competitor Ads From Your Profile
  • Discover the Ways Clients Find You

ad2.title: And You Need Justia Connect Pro â€¨Top 5 Reasons to Go Pro Today

description: Upgrade Your Legal Marketing With $200 Justia Credit: Level up your legal marketing with an annual $200 Justia Credit applicable to Justia Premium Placements in the Justia Lawyer Directory, Justia Elevate websites, or Justia Amplify PPC management services.
Stand Out With an Enhanced, Ad-Free Profile: Impress more potential clients and outshine the guy next door with an enhanced Justia Lawyer Directory profile that is free from competitor ads.

Showcase Your Best Reviews on Justia: As an exclusive benefit for Justia Connect Pro members, you can always put your best foot forward by choosing two client reviews and one peer review to feature on your Justia Profile.
Expand Your Knowledge With Justia Webinars: Never miss out on a learning opportunity! Gain priority access to select presentations and earn CLE credit for select webinars at no additional cost.

Get High-Value Benefits at a Low Price: Justia Connect Pro is available in affordable monthly ($19.99/month) and yearly ($16.65/month paid annually) membership plans. Plus, your upgraded membership pays for itself when you use your annual Justia Credit!
